faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our hardware products

0.question: When will the hardware products be released?
0.answer: MeetingMind Mic is scheduled for Q2 2024, and MeetingMind Pod for Q3 2024. Pre-order to be the first to receive launch notifications.

1.question: Are they compatible with existing meeting software?
1.answer: Yes, they're fully compatible with all major video conferencing platforms including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Webex. Plug-and-play ready without additional driver installation.

2.question: How long does the battery last?
2.answer: MeetingMind Pod offers up to 20 hours, and MeetingMind Mic up to 12 hours of continuous use. Smart power saving automatically minimizes power consumption when not in use.

3.question: Can I cancel my pre-order?
3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your pre-order anytime before launch. No cancellation fees or penalties - simply cancel with one email.

finalCta.title: Experience the Future of Meetings
finalCta.subtitle: Start smarter meetings with MeetingMind hardware

pricing.title: Fair pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing policy that all teams can use, regardless of size

faq.title: Have any
faq.subtitle: We've compiled the most frequently asked questions

items.question: How accurate is the transcription?
items.answer: MeetingMind boasts high accuracy of over 95%. Through deep learning-based speech recognition technology and speaker separation technology, we provide accurate transcription even in complex meeting environments.

items.question: Which languages are supported?
items.answer: We currently support 12 languages including Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese, and we're continuously expanding language support. Automatic language recognition is also available for multilingual meetings.

items.question: Is team sharing secure?
items.answer: Yes, it's very secure. All data is protected through AES-256 encryption, and we comply with GDPR and SOC2 security standards. Team member access control is also available.

items.question: When am I billed?
items.answer: Pro plans are billed monthly or yearly on a subscription basis. After the first payment, you'll be automatically billed on the same date each month, and you can cancel anytime.

items.question: What are the limitations of the free plan?
items.answer: The free plan supports up to 5 meetings per month, with a maximum of 30 minutes per meeting. Basic summary features are provided, but advanced AI analysis and team sharing features are available in the Pro plan.

items.question: How can I get customer support?
items.answer: Pro plan users get 24/7 priority support. Support is available via email, chat, and video calls, with an average response time of within 1 hour.

support.title: Need more help?
support.description: Feel free to contact us anytime. Our dedicated team will help you.

cta.title: Ready to save hours on meeting notes?

items.question: How do I start a free trial?
items.answer: You can start a free trial immediately after signing up on the website. No credit card information is required.

items.question: How do I purchase an enterprise plan?
items.answer: Enterprise plans are provided with customized quotes after consultation with our sales team. Leave your contact information and we'll contact you within 24 hours.

items.question: Is on-site training available?
items.answer: Yes, we provide on-site training services for enterprise customers. We conduct customized training programs according to team size and requirements.

items.question: Is API integration possible?
items.answer: We support real-time integration through RESTful API and WebSocket. We provide developer documentation and SDK for easy integration.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Check MeetingMind's Terms of Service. Please read carefully before using our service.
meta.keywords: MeetingMind Terms of Service, service terms, usage conditions, user rights

general.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
general.content: These Terms of Service aim to define the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and users regarding the use of AI-powered meeting analysis service (the 'Service') provided by MeetingMind (the 'Company').

definitions.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
definitions.content:
The definitions of terms used in these Terms are as follows:
1. 'Service' refers to the AI-powered meeting analysis platform provided by the Company.
2. 'User' refers to members and non-members who access the Service and receive services provided by the Company in accordance with these Terms.
3. 'Member' refers to a person who has registered as a member by providing personal information to the Service and can continuously use the Service.

service.title: Article 3 (Service Content)
service.content:
The Company provides the following services:
1. Meeting voice recording and transcription service
2. AI-powered meeting content analysis and summarization
3. Meeting participant speech analysis and action item extraction
4. Meeting data storage and search service
5. Meeting content sharing and collaboration tools among team members
6. Other services determined by the Company

membership.title: Article 4 (Membership Registration)
membership.content:
Membership registration is concluded when a user agrees to the Terms and applies for membership registration, and the Company approves such application. The Company may not approve applications that fall under the following categories:
1. When the applicant has previously lost membership status under these Terms
2. When using a false name or another person's identity
3. When false information is provided or required information is not provided

privacy.title: Article 5 (Privacy Protection)
privacy.content: The Company establishes and publishes a privacy policy in accordance with applicable laws to protect users' personal information. Users' personal information is protected in accordance with applicable laws and the privacy policy.

restrictions.title: Article 6 (Usage Restrictions)
restrictions.content:
The Company may restrict or suspend service usage without prior notice when users engage in the following activities:
1. Stealing others' information or registering false information
2. Disrupting the stable operation of the Service
3. Entering content that violates public order or good morals
4. Engaging in criminal activities or other illegal activities

disclaimer.title: Article 7 (Disclaimer)
disclaimer.content: The Company is exempt from responsibility for service provision when unable to provide services due to natural disasters, wars, and other force majeure events. The Company is not responsible for service usage disruptions or damages caused by users' fault.

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Check MeetingMind's Privacy Policy. Detailed information about personal information collection, use, and protection.
meta.keywords: MeetingMind Privacy Policy, personal information protection, data processing, personal information collection

overview.title: Privacy Policy Overview
overview.content: MeetingMind (the 'Company') values users' personal information and complies with applicable laws including the Personal Information Protection Act and the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection. The Company informs users about the purposes and methods of using personal information and the measures taken to protect personal information through this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: Collection and Use of Personal Information
collection.content:
The Company processes personal information for the following purposes:
1. Contract fulfillment and fee settlement for service provision
2. Confirmation of membership registration intention and member identification/authentication for membership services
3. Maintenance and management of membership status, prevention of service misuse
4. Record keeping for various notices, notifications, complaint handling, and dispute resolution
5. Service improvement and customized service provision

items.title: Personal Information Items Collected
items.content:
The Company collects the following personal information:
1. Required items: Name, email address, password
2. Optional items: Mobile phone number, company name, job title
3. Automatically collected items: IP address, cookies, service usage records, access logs, device information
4. Information generated during service use: Meeting recording files, transcription text, analysis results

retention.title: Personal Information Retention and Use Period
retention.content:
The Company destroys personal information without exception immediately after the collection and use purposes are achieved. However, the following information is retained for the specified periods for the reasons stated:
1. Upon membership withdrawal: Retained for 1 year to prevent misuse
2. Records related to contracts or subscription withdrawals: 5 years
3. Records related to payment and supply of goods: 5 years
4. Records related to consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years

sharing.title: Third-Party Provision of Personal Information
sharing.content:
The Company does not provide users' personal information to external parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:
1. When users have given prior consent
2. When required by law or legal procedures for investigation purposes
3. When necessary for fee settlement related to service provision
4. When provided in processed form that cannot identify specific individuals for statistics, academic research, or market research

security.title: Technical/Administrative Measures for Personal Information Protection
security.content:
The Company takes the following measures to safely process users' personal information:
1. Minimization and education of personal information handling staff
2. Access restrictions to personal information
3. Storage and forgery prevention of access records
4. Encryption of personal information
5. Technical measures against hacking
6. Access authority management for personal information processing systems

rights.title: Data Subject Rights and Exercise Methods
rights.content:
Users can exercise the following rights as data subjects:
1. Request for notification of personal information processing status
2. Request for suspension of personal information processing
3. Request for correction/deletion of personal information
4. Request for damage compensation
The above rights can be exercised through written documents, telephone, email, fax, etc., and the Company will take measures without delay.

contact.title: Personal Information Protection Officer
contact.content:
The Company designates a Personal Information Protection Officer as follows to take overall responsibility for personal information processing and handle complaints and damage relief related to personal information processing:

Personal Information Protection Officer
Name: Mr. Kim OO
Position: Personal Information Protection Team Leader
Contact: privacy@meetingmind.ai

Personal Information Protection Department
Department: Personal Information Protection Team
Contact: privacy@meetingmind.ai
